title: Aww! Little Chrys!
author: JGray
text:
Look! Chrys as a little itty bitty! Look how adorable she is! Awww!

Honestly, I'm gonna let that image of her speak for itself.

See you Thursday!

replies.author: Sario528*Guest*
replies.text: I notice that the Inn's translation spell is in effect in that last panel.

replies.author: adam*Guest*
replies.text: She used to be more of a tomboy than now she is.
